entry.title: 丹青演讲30个问㼵和答案中英版本
entry.content:
问题

  1. “丹青”与中国传统文化之间有什么联系？

    What is the connection between “Painting in colors” andtraditional Chinese culture？
  2. 请表达一下您对文化传承的看法。

    please express your opinion on cultural inheritance
  3. 画画如何有助于我们的学业？

    How can painting be helpful in our academic study？
  4. 您认为“艺术的力量”是什么样的？

    What do you think of“The power of Art”
  5. 您认为学生学习绘画是必要的吗？

    Do you think it is necessary for school students to learnpainting？
  6. 能列举一些中国文化中的典型艺术形式吗？

    Can you list some typical art forms in Chinese culture？
  7. 语言和艺术之间有哪些联系？

    What are the connections between language and art？
  8. 请描述“丹青”在中国文化中的象征意义。

    please describe the symbolic significance of “paintingincolors”in Chinese culture
  9. 年轻人可以如何为中国文化的发展做出贡献？

    What can young people do to contribute to Chinese cultural development？
  10. 您喜欢绘画吗？您认为绘画有哪些好处？

    Do you like painting? what do you think are the benefits of painting?
  11. 了解古代人生活的可能途径是什么？

    What is an possible way for people to know the lives of theancient people?
  12. 中国传统绘画艺术与西方油画有什么区别？

    What are the differences between traditional Chinese paintingart and Western oil painting?
  13. 中国传统文化和艺术有各种表现形式，您最喜欢哪一种？为什么？

    Chinese traditional culture and art have various forms of expression, which one do you like the most? –Why？
  14. 学生在保护和推广与丹青相关的文化遗产方面可以发挥什么作用？

    What role can students play in preserving and promotingthecultural heritage related to Danqing?
  15. 技术进步对传统文化和艺术有什么影响？请从正面和负面两方面解释。

    What impact does technological progress have on traditional culture and art? Please explain from both positive and negative perspectives.
  16. 哪位古代艺术家给您留下了最深刻的印象？您最敬佩的现代艺术家是谁？

    Which ancient artist left the deepest impression on you? Which modern artist doyouadmire the most?
  17. 在所有著名的绘画作品中，您最喜欢哪一幅？

    Among all the famous paintings, which one do you like the most?
  18. 有哪些方面更能体现我们中华民族的文化自信？

    What aspects can better reflect the cultural confidence of our Chinese nation?
  19. 社会主义精神文明的主要特征之一是文化和艺术的繁荣。在这方面，您个人能做出什么贡献？

    One of the main characteristics of socialist spiritual civilization is the prosperity of culture and art. What kind of contribution can you personally make in this regard?
  20. 如果我们把丹青比作一本历史书，您对于在这本书中写新篇章有什么好建议？

    If we compare Danqing to a history book, do you have any good suggestions for writing a new chapter in this book?
  21. 文化艺术的发展水平决定一个国家的软实力。您认为中国当前的软实力足够强大吗？

    The level of cultural and artistic development determines a country’s soft power. Do you think China’s current soft power is strong enough?
  22. 中国是否有一些传统文化和艺术传统面临失落的风险？

    Are there any traditional cultural and artistic traditions in China facing the risk of loss?
  23. 一幅优秀的绘画有哪些具体方面？

    What are the specific aspects of an excellent painting?
  24. 阅读文天祥的诗”自古逢秋悲寂寥，我言秋日胜春朝。晴空一鹤排云上，便引诗情到碧霄。”有什么感受？您从中学到了什么？

    What do you feel from reading Wen Tianxiang’s poem “No one can avoid deathsinceancient times,but let my heart shine through history.”? And what have you learned?
  25. 很多中国人正在阅读莎士比亚的作品。您是否也希望看到更多外国人阅读唐诗宋词？

    Many Chinese people are reading Shakespeare’s works. Do you also hope toseemany foreigners reading Tang poetry and Song lyrics?
  26. 有人把“丹青”用来指代拥有高尚品德和情感的人。您周围是否有这样的人？

    Danqing is sometimes used to refer to a person who possesses noble character andsentiment. Do you have such people around you?
  27. 我们都知道艺术家将心思和情感倾注在他们的艺术作品中。作为观众，我们如何理解艺术家的思想和情感？

    We all know that artists pour their heart and emotions into their works of art. Asviewers, how can we understand the thoughts and emotions of artists?
  28. 您认为文化艺术的繁荣和经济建设的繁荣应该如何相互促进？

    How do you think the prosperity of culture and art and the prosperity of economicconstruction should mutually promote each other?
  29. 作为参赛者，您在演讲有关绘画的主题时最大的收获是什么？

    As a contestant, what was your biggest gain from giving speeches on the topic of painting?
  30. 丹青艺术是中国传统文化的一宝，它对一个时代有哪些启示？对我们个体有什么启发作用？

    Danqing art is a treasure of traditional Chinese culture. What inspirations does it have for an era? What is the enlightening effect on us as individuals?

答案

  1. “丹青”与中国传统文化之间的联系：

    “丹青”在中国传统文化中通常指的是绘画，特别是国画。它是中国艺术的重要组成部分，也是中国文化传承的重要载体。在中国历史上，“丹青”被视为一种高尚的艺术形式，许多文人墨客通过绘画来表达他们的思想、情感和志向。因此，“丹青”与中国传统文化紧密相连，它不仅是一种艺术形式，更是中国文化和历史的象征。
  • The connection between “Danqing” and traditional Chinese culture:

    In traditional Chinese culture, “Danqing” usually refers to painting, especially Chinese painting. It is an important part of Chinese art and an important carrier of Chinese cultural inheritance. In Chinese history, “Danqing” was regarded as a noble art form, and many literati expressed their thoughts, emotions and aspirations through painting. Therefore, “Danqing” is closely connected with traditional Chinese culture. It is not only an art form, but also a symbol of Chinese culture and history.
  1. 对文化传承的看法：

    文化传承是一个民族、国家或地区维护其历史、价值观和生活方式的重要过程。对于个人而言，参与文化传承意味着对自身文化背景的认同和尊重。通过传承，我们可以将祖先留下的智慧和文化遗产传递给下一代，同时也可以塑造一个更加和谐、有凝聚力的社会。因此，每个人都应该意识到文化传承的重要性，并积极参与到这一过程中来。
  • Views on cultural inheritance:

    Cultural inheritance is an important process for a nation, country or region to preserve its history, values and way of life. For individuals, participation in cultural inheritance means recognition and respect for their own cultural background. Through inheritance, we can pass on the wisdom and cultural heritage left by our ancestors to the next generation, while also shaping a more harmonious and cohesive society. Therefore, everyone should be aware of the importance of cultural inheritance and actively participate in this process.
  1. 画画如何有助于学业：

    画画不仅是一种艺术形式，也是一种能够促进学业发展的技能。首先，画画有助于提高学生的创造力和想象力，这在学习其他科目时也非常重要。其次，画画能够培养学生的观察力和分析能力，这对于理解复杂的科学概念和解决问题都很有帮助。此外，画画还可以帮助学生减轻压力、提高注意力和集中力，从而更好地应对学业挑战。
  • How drawing helps with school:

    Drawing is not only an art form, but also a skill that promotes academic development. First of all, drawing helps to improve students’ creativity and imagination, which is also very important when learning other subjects. Secondly, drawing can cultivate students’ observation and analysis skills, which are helpful for understanding complex scientific concepts and solving problems. In addition, drawing can also help students reduce stress, improve attention and concentration, and thus better cope with academic challenges.
  1. “艺术的力量”是什么：

    艺术的力量在于它能够触动人的内心，激发情感共鸣，传递深层次的思想和价值观。艺术可以打破语言和文化的障碍，用直观、感性的方式表达人类共同的体验和情感。好的艺术作品能够打动人心，让人产生思考和反思，甚至能够影响社会观念和文化的变革。因此，艺术的力量是无穷的，它可以触动人的灵魂，启迪人的智慧，提升人的精神境界。
  • What is the “power of art” :

    The power of art lies in its ability to touch people’s hearts, inspire emotional resonance, and convey deep ideas and values. Art can break down the barriers of language and culture and express common human experiences and emotions in an intuitive and emotional way. Good works of art can move people’s hearts, make people think and reflect, and even influence the change of social concepts and culture. Therefore, the power of art is infinite, it can touch people’s soul, enlighten people’s wisdom, and enhance people’s spiritual realm.
  1. 学生是否应该学习绘画：

    绘画是一门具有深远价值的艺术形式，它不仅能够培养学生的创造力、观察力和表达能力，还能够帮助学生发展耐心和专注力。通过绘画，学生可以更好地理解色彩、构图和线条等视觉元素，并将其应用到生活和学习的各个方面。此外，绘画也是一种表达个人情感和思想的方式，可以帮助学生发展自我认知和自我表达能力。因此，我认为学生应该学习绘画。
  • Whether students should learn to draw:

    Painting is an art form of profound value, which can not only cultivate students’ creativity, observation and expression skills, but also help students develop patience and concentration. Through drawing, students gain a better understanding of visual elements such as color, composition, and line, and apply them to all aspects of life and learning. In addition, drawing is also a way to express personal feelings and thoughts, which can help students develop self-awareness and self-expression skills. Therefore, I think students should learn painting.
  1. 中国文化中的典型艺术形式：

    中国文化中有很多典型的艺术形式，其中最具代表性的包括国画、书法、篆刻、剪纸、皮影戏、戏曲等。这些艺术形式各有特色，如国画注重意境和气韵生动，书法则强调笔墨纸砚的韵味和书法的章法结构等。它们都是中国文化的瑰宝，也是世界文化的重要组成部分。
  • Typical art forms in Chinese culture:

    There are many typical art forms in Chinese culture, the most representative of which include traditional Chinese painting, calligraphy, seal cutting, paper cutting, shadow puppetry, opera and so on. These art forms have their own characteristics, such as Chinese painting pays attention to the artistic conception and vivid atmosphere, calligraphy emphasizes the charm of ink, paper and inkstone and the structure of calligraphy. They are both treasures of Chinese culture and an important part of world culture.
  1. 语言和艺术之间的联系：

    语言和艺术之间有着密切的联系。语言是一种符号系统，通过特定的语法和词汇来表达思想和意义；而艺术则是一种表现形式，通过色彩、线条、形态等手段来传达情感和意象。在艺术创作中，语言作为一种媒介和工具被用来表达艺术家的思想和情感。同时，艺术也通过其独特的视觉语言来创造新的符号和意象，从而拓展了语言的表达范围和深度。
  • The connection between language and art:

    There is a close connection between language and art. Language is a symbolic system that expresses ideas and meanings through specific grammar and vocabulary. Art, on the other hand, is a form of expression that conveys emotion and image through color, line, form and other means. In artistic creation, language, as a medium and tool, is used to express the artist’s thoughts and emotions. At the same time, art also creates new symbols and images through its unique visual language, thus expanding the scope and depth of language expression.
  1. “丹青”在中国文化中的象征意义：

    首先，“丹青”代表着中国传统的绘画艺术，它所具有的独特魅力和价值观念，已经深深地融入了中国文化的血脉之中。其次，“丹青”还象征着中国文化的精神和内涵，它所描绘的景象和人物都蕴含着深刻的思想和哲理，体现了中国文化的深厚底蕴。此外，“丹青”也代表着中国文化的传承和发展，它所承载的历史和文化信息，为我们提供了一个了解和传承中国文化的窗口。
  • The symbolic significance of “Danqing” in Chinese culture:

    First of all, “Danqing” represents the traditional Chinese painting art, and its unique charm and values have been deeply integrated into the blood of Chinese culture. Secondly, “Danqing” also symbolizes the spirit and connotation of Chinese culture, and the scenes and characters it describes contain profound thoughts and philosophies, reflecting the profound heritage of Chinese culture. In addition, “Danqing” also represents the inheritance and development of Chinese culture, and the historical and cultural information it carries provides us with a window to understand and inherit Chinese culture.
  1. 学生们在保护和推广与丹青相关的文化遗产方面可以发挥什么作用：

    学生们在保护和推广与丹青相关的文化遗产方面可以发挥重要作用。首先，他们可以通过学习和传承传统绘画技艺，成为这一文化遗产的继承者和传承者。其次，学生们可以利用现代技术和社交媒体等手段，宣传和展示传统绘画的艺术魅力，吸引更多人了解和关注这一文化遗产。此外，学生们还可以参与相关的文化交流活动，与其他国家和地区的青年共同探讨和推动文化遗产的保护和传承。
  • What role can students play in preserving and promoting the cultural heritage associated with Tanching?

    Students have an important role to play in protecting and promoting the cultural heritage associated with Tanching. First, they can become inheritors and inheritors of this cultural heritage by learning and inheriting traditional painting skills. Secondly, students can use modern technology and social media and other means to publicize and display the artistic charm of traditional painting, attracting more people to understand and pay attention to this cultural heritage. In addition, students can also participate in related cultural exchange activities, and discuss and promote the protection and transmission of cultural heritage with young people from other countries and regions.
  1. 您是否喜欢绘画，认为绘画有哪些好处：

    我个人非常喜欢绘画，并且认为它有许多好处。首先，绘画是一种表达个人情感和思想的方式，可以帮助人们更好地理解自己。其次，绘画能够培养人们的创造力和想象力，激发人们的灵感和创新能力。此外，绘画还可以提高人们的审美能力和艺术修养，使人们更加欣赏和尊重艺术和文化。最后，绘画也是一种放松身心的方式，可以帮助人们减轻压力和焦虑。
  • Do you like painting? What are the benefits of painting?

    I personally like painting very much and think it has many benefits. First of all, painting is a way to express personal feelings and thoughts, which can help people understand themselves better. Secondly, painting can cultivate people’s creativity and imagination, stimulate people’s inspiration and innovation ability. In addition, painting can also improve people’s aesthetic ability and artistic accomplishment, so that people can appreciate and respect art and culture more. Finally, painting is also a way to relax the body and mind, which can help people reduce stress and anxiety.
  1. 了解古代人生活的可能途径是什么：

    了解古代人生活的可能途径有很多种。首先，我们可以从古代文献和史书中获取一些关于古代人的生活信息。其次，通过考古发掘和研究，我们可以了解古代人的物质文化和社会制度等方面的情况。此外，古代艺术作品也是了解古代人生活的重要途径之一，包括绘画、雕塑、陶瓷等。通过这些艺术作品，我们可以深入了解古代人的审美观念、生活习俗和社会风貌等方面的情况。
  • What are the possible ways to understand the life of ancient people:

    There are many possible ways to learn about the lives of ancient people. First of all, we can get some information about the lives of ancient people from ancient documents and history books. Secondly, through archaeological excavation and research, we can understand the material culture and social system of ancient people. In addition, ancient art works are also one of the important ways to understand the life of ancient people, including paintings, sculptures, ceramics and so on. Through these works of art, we can have a deep understanding of the ancient people’s aesthetic concepts, life customs and social styles.
  1. 中国传统绘画艺术与西方油画有什么区别：

    中国传统绘画艺术与西方油画在很多方面存在明显的区别。首先，中国传统绘画注重笔墨的运用和表现，强调线条的节奏和韵律感，而西方油画则更注重色彩的表现和光影的变化。其次，中国传统绘画的构图和章法比较自由灵活，而西方油画则更加注重透视和空间感的营造。此外，中国传统绘画的主题和内容常常与自然、哲学、道德等方面相关联，而西方油画则更加注重人物形象的表现和情感的表达。这些区别反映了中西方文化和审美的不同特点。
  • What are the differences between traditional Chinese painting and Western oil painting?

    There are obvious differences between traditional Chinese painting and Western oil painting in many aspects. First of all, traditional Chinese painting pays attention to the use and expression of ink and brush, emphasizing the rhythm and rhythm of lines, while Western oil painting pays more attention to the expression of color and the change of light and shadow. Secondly, the composition and structure of traditional Chinese painting are more free and flexible, while Western oil painting pays more attention to the creation of perspective and spatial sense. In addition, the theme and content of traditional Chinese painting are often related to nature, philosophy, morality, etc., while Western oil painting pays more attention to the expression of characters and emotions. These differences reflect the different characteristics of Chinese and Western culture and aesthetics.

    Which traditional Chinese culture and art form do you like best? Why:
  1. 您最喜欢哪种中国传统文化和艺术形式，为什么：

    我最喜欢中国传统绘画艺术中的山水画。山水画是中国传统绘画的重要分支之一，它以自然风景为主要表现对象，注重意境的营造和对自然美的追求。山水画在技法上讲究笔墨的运用和章法的布局，通过笔触的变化和墨色的深浅来表现自然景色的层次感和立体感。同时，山水画还蕴含着丰富的哲学思想和人文精神，体现了人与自然和谐共生的理念。我认为山水画是一种具有独特魅力和深刻内涵的艺术形式，它能够让我在欣赏自然美景的同时感受到中国传统文化的博大精深。
  • Which traditional Chinese culture and art form do you like best? Why:

    Landscape painting is my favorite part of traditional Chinese painting. Landscape painting is one of the important branches of traditional Chinese painting. It takes natural scenery as the main object of expression, and pays attention to the construction of artistic conception and the pursuit of natural beauty. Landscape painting pays attention to the use of brush and ink and the layout of rules, and expresses the sense of layer and three-dimensional sense of natural scenery through the change of brush strokes and the depth of ink color. At the same time, landscape painting also contains rich philosophical thoughts and humanistic spirit, reflecting the concept of harmonious coexistence between man and nature. In my opinion, landscape painting is an art form with unique charm and profound connotation, which enables me to appreciate the natural beauty and feel the profound and profound Chinese traditional culture.
  1. 学生在保护和推广与丹青相关的文化遗产方面可以发挥什么作用：

    学生在保护和推广与丹青相关的文化遗产方面可以发挥重要作用。首先，学生可以通过学习和传承传统绘画技艺，成为这一文化遗产的继承者和传承者。学生可以参加绘画课程、参观艺术博物馆、参与文化交流活动等，提高自己的艺术素养和文化修养。其次，学生可以利用现代技术和社交媒体等手段，宣传和展示传统绘画的艺术魅力，吸引更多人了解和关注这一文化遗产。学生可以在社交媒体上分享自己的作品、发起线上展览、撰写有关传统绘画的文章等，提高公众对传统文化的认识和重视程度。此外，学生还可以参与相关的文化交流活动，与其他国家和地区的青年共同探讨和推动文化遗产的保护和传承。通过参加国际文化交流活动、与外国学生分享经验等途径，可以加强与其他国家和地区之间的文化交流与合作，共同推进世界文化的繁荣发展。
  • What role can students play in the conservation and promotion of cultural heritage related to Tanching?

    Students have an important role to play in protecting and promoting the cultural heritage associated with Tanching. First of all, students can become inheritors and inheritors of this cultural heritage by learning and passing on traditional painting skills. Students can participate in painting classes, visit art museums, participate in cultural exchange activities, etc., to improve their artistic quality and cultural accomplishment. Secondly, students can use modern technology and social media and other means to publicize and display the artistic charm of traditional painting, attracting more people to understand and pay attention to this cultural heritage. Students can share their works on social media, launch online exhibitions, write articles about traditional paintings, etc., to raise public awareness and value of traditional culture. In addition, students can also participate in relevant cultural exchange activities to discuss and promote the protection and inheritance of cultural heritage with young people from other countries and regions. By participating in international cultural exchange activities and sharing experience with foreign students, cultural exchanges and cooperation with other countries and regions can be strengthened, and the prosperity and development of world culture can be jointly promoted.
  1. 技术进步对传统文化和艺术的影响：

    技术进步对传统文化和艺术的影响是双面的。一方面，技术进步为传统文化和艺术的传播提供了更广阔的平台。例如，互联网的发展使得更多的人能够接触到各种艺术形式，而数字化技术则让艺术作品得以永久保存。另一方面，技术进步也带来了一些挑战。随着科技的发展，一些传统文化和艺术形式可能逐渐被边缘化，甚至面临消失的风险。因此，如何在保持传统文化和艺术精髓的同时，利用技术进步来推动其发展和传承，是一个值得深思的问题。
  • The impact of technological progress on traditional culture and art:

    The influence of technological progress on traditional culture and art is two-sided. On the one hand, technological progress provides a broader platform for the spread of traditional culture and art. For example, the growth of the Internet has made various art forms accessible to more people, and digital technology has allowed art works to be preserved forever. On the other hand, technological progress has also brought some challenges. With the development of science and technology, some traditional culture and art forms may gradually be marginalized or even face the risk of disappearing. Therefore, how to use technological progress to promote the development and inheritance of traditional culture and art while maintaining its essence is a question worth pondering.

At the same time, we will carry out cross-border cooperation between Danqing art and other fields to develop more creative and practical cultural products and services, so that Danqing art can better integrate into people’s lives.
  1. 您认为当前的文艺创作存在哪些问题：

    当前的文艺创作存在一些问题。首先，过度商业化和娱乐化倾向严重。一些文艺作品为了迎合市场需求和观众口味，过于追求商业利益和娱乐效果，导致作品缺乏深度和内涵。其次，缺乏创新和多样性。一些文艺作品在形式和内容上缺乏创新，过于依赖传统套路和模板，缺乏新颖独特的创作思路和表现手法。同时，对多元文化的包容性不够，缺乏对不同文化背景和群体的关注与呈现。此外，一些文艺作品过于追求形式而忽略了内在的价值和意义，导致作品缺乏思想性和人文关怀。最后，一些文艺创作者缺乏良好的职业素养和文化底蕴，导致作品质量参差不齐，甚至出现低俗化、粗糙化的问题。为了解决这些问题，需要加强文艺创作的引导和管理，鼓励优秀创作者发挥自身才华和创造力，推动文艺作品的多样化和深度化发展。
  • What problems do you think exist in current literary and artistic creation?

    There are some problems in current literary and artistic creation. First of all, the tendency of over-commercialization and entertainment is serious. In order to meet the market demand and audience taste, some literary and artistic works too pursue commercial interests and entertainment effects, resulting in the lack of depth and connotation of the works. Second, there is a lack of innovation and diversity. Some literary and artistic works lack innovation in form and content, rely too much on traditional routines and templates, and lack new and unique creative ideas and expression techniques. At the same time, the inclusiveness of multiculturalism is not enough, and the attention and presentation of different cultural backgrounds and groups are lacking. In addition, some literary and artistic works pursue the form too much and ignore the intrinsic value and meaning, resulting in the lack of ideological and humanistic care. Finally, some literary and art creators lack good professional quality and cultural heritage, resulting in uneven quality of works, and even vulgar, rough problems. In order to solve these problems, it is necessary to strengthen the guidance and management of literary and artistic creation, encourage excellent creators to give full play to their talents and creativity, and promote the diversification and in-depth development of literary and artistic works.
  1. 您认为文艺创作者应该具备哪些素质：

    文艺创作者应该具备多方面的素质。首先，他们应该具备扎实的艺术功底和专业知识，如绘画、音乐、文学等。这有助于他们深入理解艺术创作的规律和技巧，提升作品的艺术品质。其次，文艺创作者应该具备敏锐的观察力和感受力，善于从生活中汲取灵感，发现和捕捉人性的美好与真实。同时，他们应该具备独立思考和创新的能力，勇于挑战传统，探索新的艺术表达方式和形式。此外，文艺创作者还需要具备良好的文化素养和广泛的知识储备，以提升作品的文化内涵和思想深度。他们应该具备强烈的社会责任感和人文关怀精神，关注社会现实和人类命运，用艺术作品传递正能量和温暖。最后，文艺创作者还需要具备坚韧不拔的毅力和持之以恒的勤奋精神，不断追求艺术的完美和卓越。
  • What qualities do you think literary and art creators should possess?

    Literary and art creators should have many qualities. First of all, they should have a solid artistic foundation and professional knowledge, such as painting, music, literature and so on. This helps them to deeply understand the laws and techniques of artistic creation and improve the artistic quality of their works. Secondly, literary and art creators should have keen observation and sensibility, be good at drawing inspiration from life, and discover and capture the beauty and truth of human nature. At the same time, they should have the ability to think independently and innovate, dare to challenge tradition and explore new ways and forms of artistic expression. In addition, literary and art creators also need to have good cultural literacy and extensive knowledge reserves to enhance the cultural connotation and ideological depth of their works. They should have a strong sense of social responsibility and humanistic care, pay attention to social reality and human destiny, and use art works to convey positive energy and warmth. Finally, literary and art creators also need to have perseverance and perseverance of the spirit of diligence, and constantly pursue the perfection and excellence of art.
  1. 您认为如何提高文艺创作者的艺术修养：

    提高文艺创作者的艺术修养是一个持续不断的过程。首先，文艺创作者应该不断学习和探索，掌握艺术的基本原理、技巧和方法，熟悉各种艺术形式和风格。同时，他们应该关注艺术发展的动态和趋势，了解当代艺术创作的方向和潮流。其次，文艺创作者应该注重观察和体验生活，从中汲取灵感和素材。他们应该关注人性和社会问题，深入挖掘生活中的真实和美好。此外，文艺创作者还应该积极参加艺术交流和展览活动，与其他艺术家互动和学习，互相启迪和激励。同时，他们应该勇于尝试和创新，不断突破自己的创作舒适区，探索新的表现方式和风格。最后，文艺创作者应该注重自我反思和总结，不断审视自己的创作过程和作品，发现不足之处并寻求改进之道。通过不断的学习、实践和创新，文艺创作者的艺术修养将得到逐步提高和完善。
  • How do you think to improve the artistic accomplishment of literary and art creators?

    It is a continuous process to improve the artistic accomplishment of literary and art creators. First of all, literary and artistic creators should continue to study and explore, master the basic principles, skills and methods of art, and become familiar with various art forms and styles. At the same time, they should pay attention to the dynamics and trends of art development and understand the direction and trend of contemporary art creation. Secondly, literary and art creators should pay attention to observing and experiencing life, and draw inspiration and materials from it. They should pay attention to human nature and social issues, and dig deep into the truth and beauty of life. In addition, literary and art creators should also actively participate in art exchanges and exhibitions, interact with and learn from other artists, and inspire and inspire each other. At the same time, they should be brave to experiment and innovate, constantly break through their creative comfort zone, and explore new ways and styles of expression. Finally, literary and art creators should pay attention to self-reflection and summary, constantly examine their own creative process and works, find shortcomings and seek ways to improve. Through continuous study, practice and innovation, the artistic accomplishment of literary and art creators will be gradually improved and perfected.

entry.content:
如何使用AI

目录

  • 方案一:使用文心一言
  • 方案二:使用gptgod
  • 方案三:关注公众号
  • 方案四:搜一个

    实现方案

使用文心一言

点我进入官网
然后直接点开始体验,这里要讲的是换行为”shift键+回车”,如果只按回车的话则会发送
当然,文心一言3.5虽然是免费的,但是还是没有gpt有逻辑性,下面就讲解如何使用gpt

使用gptgod

  • 步骤一: 进入网站注册账号
  • 步骤二:进行使用 (点我跳过)

选项讲解

输入框上的有“联网” (可能没有) ”积分” (不需要管他) “模型” (即这个一堆字母的) (点我跳到输入讲解)
那么“联网”被点亮和不被点亮的区别是:

  • 被点亮意味着ai仅依靠自己的知识库运行
  • 被点亮意味着ai可以查答案

如果没有的话,那么就代表ai默认联网
“积分”不用管它 (因为你没有积分兑换码)
“模型”是指这个ai到底是什么,下面是对模型的解释 (点我看官方版) (点我跳过)

模型名称模型描述token最大限制(就是一次输入的词数)计费类型(按什么计费)价格(即积分)

输入讲解点我跳到积分讲解

输入区有输入框前的”上传文件”、输入框和输入框后的“发送”、”指令”与”截图”

  • “上传文件”就是把文件上传给ai,ai就可以对此分析。比如你可以上传Excel表格让ai进行数据分析,画出统计图;上传PPT,让ai修改;上传图片,进行信息提取,甚至可以按照图片里的指令运行、解决图片里的问题和对图片进行二次创作等等…
  • 输入框就是你输入内容的地方,这里要讲的是换行为”shift键+回车”,如果只按回车的话则会发送
  • “发送”就是发送指令的
  • “指令”就是当你对指令的描述不够精准的时候,就可以有指令来限制 (每个指令都会有介绍的)
  • “截图”会保存你与ai的聊天记录

积分讲解点我跳到下一方案

你应该会注意到你的积分,这里讲的是如何白嫖积分

  • 第一步: **打开我
  • 第二步:向下拉,一直到”签到”
  • 第三部:点一下签到,等到弹出的加载完毕后即签到成功 (虽然只有2000积分,但在于积少成多)

(以下步骤适合电脑技术稍高一点的人:再向下拉,就会看到”邀请注册”,打开邀请链接,然后… 临时邮箱 。当然,这个邮箱不行可以在网上再找一个)

关注公众号

  • 第一步,扫下面的二维码或在微信里直接搜”Laf开发者”,关注
  • 第二步,直接向其发信息 (不过现在好像失效了)

搜一个

点我,直接开启搜索

总结

gpt4虽然好用,但是难搞到;相比较,百度的文心一言就贴近民心一些。不过,无论是哪种方法,只要能用就行。
